body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! 

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line: 
>
/kind bug
> /kind feature


**What happened**:
Create 50Gi podVolumeClaim with glusterfs provisioner.

**What you expected to happen**:
I expected 50Gi volume would be created, instead of 54Gi.
```
$ k get pvc -o yaml test-volume-gi
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
metadata:
  annotations:
    pv.kubernetes.io/bind-completed: "yes"
    pv.kubernetes.io/bound-by-controller: "yes"
    volume.beta.kubernetes.io/storage-provisioner: kubernetes.io/glusterfs
  creationTimestamp: 2017-11-17T10:16:43Z
  name: test-volume-gi
  namespace: default
  resourceVersion: "478898"
  selfLink: /api/v1/namespaces/default/persistentvolumeclaims/test-volume-gi
  uid: 68eddbe2-cb80-11e7-8724-002590e72b34
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 50Gi
  storageClassName: regular
  volumeName: pvc-68eddbe2-cb80-11e7-8724-002590e72b34
status:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  capacity:
    storage: 54Gi
  phase: Bound
```

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
1. Create storage class with glusterfs as dynamic provisioner.
2. Create podVolumeClaim.

**Anything else we need to know?**:
Commit, that cause it: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/commit/77be9123f7f38ffb3a0a4ae79f698e49ffff56a6

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
```
$ kubectl version
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"8", GitVersion:"v1.8.1", GitCommit:"f38e43b221d08850172a9a4ea785a86a3ffa3b3a", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-10-11T23:27:35Z", GoVersion:"go1.8.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"8+", GitVersion:"v1.8.1-dirty", GitCommit:"f38e43b221d08850172a9a4ea785a86a3ffa3b3a", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2017-10-19T11:36:32Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.1", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
- Install tools:
- Others:

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Storage.
labels.name: sig/storage

title: pvc: glusterfs provisioner create volume with the wrong size
